meanings.sent1: He ran cravenly from the small dog barking at him.
meanings.sent2: She cravenly avoided confronting her fears.
meanings.sent3: The cat cravenly hid behind the couch from the vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent4: The soldier cravenly retreated from the battle, leaving his comrades behind.
meanings.sent5: The child cravenly refused to try the new food, fearing it might taste bad.

meanings.definition: Showing cowardice or lack of courage
meanings.sent1: The cravenly thief stole from the elderly woman.
meanings.sent2: His cravenly behavior in the face of danger disappointed his friends.
meanings.sent3: The cravenly squirrel refused to come down from the tree, even when offered a treat.
meanings.sent4: The cravenly decision to abandon the project was met with disapproval from the team.
meanings.sent5: Her cravenly excuses for not attending the party were transparent to everyone.
